name: Blu the Airmail Delivery Bird
description:
Blu the bird was just a regular bird. One night it seemed like his luck ran out when his home got blown away by a nasty storm. Things would soon change though, as he gets a new job as a paperboy at a nearby town...

This game is a mix of traditional shoot 'em up games and Paperboy, where you deliver mail while dodging/shooting at enemies coming at you. There's seven neighborhoods to tackle, can you get through 'em all?

Made in GB Studio.
* If the controls don't respond, try turning CAPS LOCK off.
* The game auto-saves -- press B on the title screen to get back to the last level you were on.

Changelog:
1.1.1:
- Redid the Spanish Translation with the help of GoogiPep (thanks!)
- Fixed getting hit while aiming causing you to turn invisible

1.1:
- Added a Spanish translation

1.01:
- Fixed the auto-save not loading your file
- Added some enemies to level 7
- The secret boss now transports you to the credits if you lose against it

1.0:
- Initial release
